synopsis.text: Together, Gon Freecss and his friends embark on a perilous journey to become Hunters, professionals who perform dangerous tasks such as capturing criminals and searching for lost treasures. Gon, a determined young boy, dreams of following in his father's footsteps and becoming a Hunter in order to find him. Alongside Gon are his fellow Hunter hopefuls: the vengeful Kurapika, the ambitious doctor-in-training Leorio, and the rebellious ex-assassin Killua. To achieve their dreams, they must pass the notorious Hunter Exam, a high-stakes test with a low success rate and a high probability of death. As they navigate through the challenges of the exam and the dangers of the world, they will learn what it truly means to be a Hunter and form unbreakable bonds with one another.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
